title: EXT_primitive_voxels glTF Mesh Primitive extension
description: `EXT_primitive_voxels` extension for a primitive in a glTF model, to specify voxel grid geomtetry for volumetric data

dimensions.description: Dimensions of the voxel grid. x/y/z for a box, r/theta/z for a cylinder, lat/lon/height for an ellipsoid.

neighborEdgeCount.description: The number of rows of neighboring tiles' voxel data.
